results.content: SSL configuration in load balancer is not available in the course, however the course is good and it give real enviroment of the configuration.
results.content_html: SSL configuration in load balancer is not available in the course, however the course is good and it give real enviroment of the configuration.

results.content:
1. The course didn't handle the file level sync between servers. 
2. Database should not be exposed to the public network at all. LightSail instances should be connected to the RDS DB via local IP.
3. In the tutorial, during configuration of security group for RDS, he specify /16 for the public IP addresses. That is obviously a big security issue and those who didn't know will just follow blindly.
results.content_html:
1. The course didn't handle the file level sync between servers.
2. Database should not be exposed to the public network at all. LightSail instances should be connected to the RDS DB via local IP.
3. In the tutorial, during configuration of security group for RDS, he specify /16 for the public IP addresses. That is obviously a big security issue and those who didn't know will just follow blindly.

results.content:
Gostei bastante do curso. Sou Brasileiro e faço muitos cursos por aqui. O curso é bem direto e didático. Mas UM ERRO NO MATERIAL IMPRESSO (falta de uma VÍRGULA) me fez ter que voltar no curso e investir DUAS HORAS ADICIONAIS no troubleshooting... 

Outra coisa importante é que o curso, na parte de LoadBalancing recomenda um recurso que custa US$18,00 e que não possui "free tier" ou "demo". Ou seja: se quiser testar, tem que pagar...

No geral, o curso é bom.

response.content: Thank you for your review, Renatho. Hope this course has helped you learn setting up multi-server WordPress. If you've any questions related to the course, always feel free to inbox me. Thanks.
response.content_html: Thank you for your review, Renatho. Hope this course has helped you learn setting up multi-server WordPress. If you've any questions related to the course, always feel free to inbox me. Thanks.

results.content: In the last lesson, the Instructor did say that he will tell about configuring in the DNS of the load balancer and  HTTPs settings in the next lesson but there isn't anything after the 22nd lesson, so I believe the last lesson is missing or have been left out of the course willingly. It should have been part of the course because it is very important and much-required information.
